name: Calculate centered position correctly
description:
Scenario: Text bounding box is 100x20. Center is (500, 500).
        Expectation: Top-left x = 500 - (100/2) = 450.
                     Top-left y = 500 - (20/2) = 490.
descriptionHtml:
Scenario: Text bounding box is 100x20. Center is (500, 500).
    Expectation: Top-left x = 500 - (100/2) = 450.
                 Top-left y = 500 - (20/2) = 490.
